script.author: jgarrison
script.title: disable-the-down-down-interfaces.slax
script.synopsis: This event script disables the interfaces which are already down.
script.description: This event script is confiigured to run on a weekly basis. It grabs the "show interfaces terse" command and checks for the Admin and Link statuses to be down. If they are both down, it disables the interfaces configuration.
